data.title: Luxury Hotel in Central London
data.meta_description: The Prince Akatoki London offers a luxurious 5-star experience in the heart of central London. Book direct today for the best rates.
data.text:
Welcome to The Prince Akatoki London

2 Adults

0 Children

1 Rooms

Adults

Children

Rooms

Done

Offer Code

The Prince Akatoki London

Central London Location.

Welcome to The Prince Akatoki, your luxury London accommodation located in the heart of central London. Our boutique hotel in London offers a Forbes awarded 5-star luxury experience inspired by Japanese hospitality.

Each of our 82 rooms and suites is beautifully designed with a minimal aesthetic, natural elements and luxury fabrics to promote mindfulness and tranquillity. Experience plush beds, premium amenities, luxurious rain showers and complimentary high-speed internet at our luxury London hotel.

Key Hotel Features

Restaurant

Lounge & Bar

Digital Room Key

Gymnasium

TV Casting

Wellness Amenities

3.4 miles

London Eye

Located in the heart of London, along the River Thames, the London Eye is situated across the river from the Houses of Parliament and Big Ben.

0.2 miles from hotel

Marble Arch

Marble Arch is one of London’s most famous landmarks.

0.4 miles from hotel

Hyde Park

One of London’s Royal Parks, Hyde Park is also one of the greatest city parks in the world covering 142 hectares (350 acres) and with over 4,000 trees.

2.0 miles from hotel

Natural History Museum

The National History Museum is a world-leading visitor attraction and leading science research centre.

1.5 miles from hotel

Little Venice

This charming neighbourhood, characterized by its network of canals and colourful narrowboats, offers a serene escape from bustling city life.

8.1 miles from hotel

The Painted Hall

Often referred to as the "Sistine Chapel of the UK," this magnificent baroque masterpiece boasts an awe-inspiring ceiling adorned with intricate paintings.

4.2 miles from hotel

Royal Exchange

Once a hub for trade and commerce, the Royal Exchange now houses an exquisite collection of luxury boutiques and upscale dining establishments.

4.7 miles from hotel

Kyoto Garden

Find serenity in the heart of London at the Kyoto Garden, a tranquil Japanese-inspired haven nestled within Holland Park. This meticulously landscaped garden features traditional Japanese elements.

2.0 miles from hotel

The British Museum

The museum’s vast collections, which span over two million years of history, offer an educational and awe-inspiring experience. Admission is free, allowing everyone to indulge in the rich tapestry of global cultures.

5.4 miles from hotel

Borough Market

A short stroll from London Bridge, Borough Market is a paradise for food lovers. This historic market has been serving Londoners for over a thousand years and is renowned for its diverse and high-quality produce.

3.3 miles from hotel

Victoria and Albert Museum (V&A)

The world’s leading museum of art and design. Founded in 1852, it boasts an extensive collection of over 2.3 million objects, spanning 5,000 years of human creativity.

4.3 miles from hotel

Sky Garden

Located atop the “Walkie Talkie” building (20 Fenchurch Street), the Sky Garden offers a unique combination of lush greenery and breathtaking panoramic views of London.

Restaurant

TOKii

Focused on sushi, sashimi, seafood, and meat cooked on the Robata grill, TOKii offers a unique dining experience in central London. Our menu features a delightful fusion of East and West flavors, showcasing the best of Japanese cuisine. Whether you’re craving traditional sushi or innovative dishes like chicken teriyaki buns and Spicy Tuna Maki, our restaurant is the perfect destination for a memorable culinary journey.

View the Restaurant

Bar & Lounge

The Malt Lounge & Bar

In the heart of Central London, The Malt Lounge & Bar, a renowned whiskey bar in Marylebone, stands out as a top destination for connoisseurs. Recently awarded the best bartender in the UK, our establishment offers a unique experience with signature cocktails, premium international single malt whiskies and authentic Japanese sake.

View the Bar

Top Questions

Our check-in is from 3pm and check-out at 12pm.

American citizens do not require a Visa for the UK and can visit for a period of 6 months.

The nearest airport is Heathrow, approximately 16 miles away.

We can arrange direct transfers from the airport. If you would like to arrange an airport transfer, please contact reservations@theprinceakatokilondon.com for more information.

The Prince Akatoki London is located in the heart of London, only 5-minute walk from Marble Arch Station and approx. 8-minute walk from Bond Street station.

Breakfast

Sat – Sun 7:00 am–11:00 am
